text: Tamen duiyu zhenzhu meiyou zhenzheng de renshi, dangshi, tamen shuo:`Zhenzhu meiyou ba renhe wu xiang shi gei renhe ren.'Ni shuo:`Shui jiang shile mu sa suo chuanshou de, keyi zuo shiren de guangming he xiangdao de tian jing ne? Nimen ba na bu tian jing chaolu zai yixie san zhishang, nimen fabiao yibufen, yincang da bufen. Nimen ceng shouguo ziji he zuxian suo wei renshi de jiaoxun.'Ni shuo:`Shi zhenzhu.'Ranhou, ren sui tamen zai wangyan zhong youxi.
